ik.title: Ik

side.description: Order side: YES (buying a 'Yes' contract) or NO (buying a 'No' contract)

take_profit.description: Optional: parameters for automatically taking profit

stop_loss.description: Optional: parameters for automatically stopping losses

auto_cancel.description: Optional: settings for automatically canceling the order after a delay
